metadata.title: CVE-2016-5362 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The IPTables firewall in OpenStack Neutron before 7.0.4 and 8.0.0 through8.1.0 allows remote attackers to bypass an intended DHCP-spoofingprotection mechanism and consequently cause a denial of service orintercept network traffic via a crafted DHCP discovery message.

criterions.comment: neutron: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
